append_prompt.title: Append Prompt
append_prompt.description: Extra text appended to the prompt

use_bedrock.title: Use AWS Bedrock
use_bedrock.description: Route API calls through AWS Bedrock. Requires AWS credentials via env vars or ~/.aws/credentials.

aws_region.title: AWS Region
aws_region.description: AWS region for Bedrock (e.g. us-east-1). Falls back to AWS_REGION env var when not set.

base_command_override.title: Base Command Override
base_command_override.description: Override the base command with a custom command

additional_params.title: Additional Parameters
additional_params.description: Additional parameters to append to the base command

env.title: Environment Variables
env.description: Environment variables to set when running the executor
